cells.data:
-- mappendComparing2 :: [((a -> b), Bool)] -> (a -> a -> Ordering)
on mappendComparing2(fBools)
    script
        on |λ|(x, y)
            script
                on |λ|(ord, fb)
                    if ord ≠ |EQ| then
                        ord
                    else
                        set f to |1| of fb
                        tell mReturn(f)
                            if |2| of fb then
                                compare(|λ|(x), |λ|(y))
                            else
                                compare(|λ|(y), |λ|(x))
                            end if
                        end tell
                    end if
                end |λ|
            end script
            foldl(result, 0, fBools)
        end |λ|
    end script
end mappendComparing
